message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow section, I can see there's a line item specifically labeled:
```
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-29 |
```

This line item appears under "Cash and Cash Equivalents" in the cash flow statement, which clearly indicates the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

I can also verify this amount by looking at the balance sheet, where the sum of initial cash accounts ("Cash on Hand" and "Bank Deposits") equals:
```
Cash on Hand: 3000000.00
Bank Deposits: 5000000.00
Total: 8000000.00
```

This confirms that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'} }
```
